p.s: The movie The Hate U Give was released in 2018 and directed by George Tillmann Jr..
It is a film version of the novel The Hate U Give by Angie Thomas and about the ability to speak up.
In the given sequence Starr is in school and sees her boyfriend Chris, who walks down the hallway.
She turns away from him, but he stops at her locker and shows her his new music tape.
Starr tells him, that she is still mad at him because of something that happened a few days before.
Chris argues that he has not met her parents yet and says that he just wanted to find a way to be closer to Starr, because she is very important to him.
He also says that he made the mixtape for her and demonstrates his love with dancing to the music in the school hallway.
